content:
I refreshed the IG Publisher and made some terminology-related updates to the IPS content last night. It's been a few days since I had build the IG, but now I have 91 of these errors with the ig-uv-ips.xml file:

ImplementationGuide/ig-uv-ips: ImplementationGuide.definition.resource[1].extension error   The extension http://tools.fhir.org/StructureDefinition/resource-information is unknown, and not allowed here

I haven't made any changes in ig-uv-ips.xml, and now it's giving the error for each repetition of the 'definition.resource' element (which has no resource-information or other declared extensions). Has anyone seen this or anything like it, or know what to do about it? @Lloyd McKenzie?
That's a new issue with an extension Grahame has injected. Just ignore the error and we'll make it go away soon-ish
Oh, ok. I didn't recall having seen it mentioned anywhere, so it's good that you know about it and we can ignore it.
I may end up debugging this today...
oh. it gets removed before publication, but not before validation.....
should add it as a known extension. Just haven't got around to it
